titlepage.titleproper: Guide to the American screen and theater : photographs and lobby cards, 1914-1965(bulk: 1930-1949)

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: American screen and theater : photographs and lobby cards,

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Stanford University. Libraries. Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives.

did.abstract: Includes 231 photographs and 231 lobby cards. Some of the photographs are signed by the stars. Many of the productions were performed in San Francisco's Curran and Geary theaters, some in New York and Los Angeles, and only one, "Wedding Bells," in London, 1920. The earliest photographs are from a production in Salt Lake City, "Back to the Country Store," 1914.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

custodhist.head: Provenance
custodhist.p: Originally part of the Stanford Libraries Theater Collection.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: American screen and theater : photographs and lobby cards. Mss Photo 199. Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Originally part of the Stanford Libraries Theater Collection.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Includes 231 photographs and 231 lobby cards. Some of the photographs are signed by the stars. Many of the productions were performed in San Francisco's Curran and Geary theaters, some in New York and Los Angeles, and only one, "Wedding Bells," in London, 1920. The earliest photographs are from a production in Salt Lake City, "Back to the Country Store," 1914.
The collection is filed alphabetically by name of production. Playwrights and screenwriters are searchable on the database, as are actors and actresses.

controlaccess.head: Access Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: Motion picture actors and actresses.
Motion pictures--United States--History--20th century.
Theater--United States--History--20th century.
Theater--California--San Francisco.
Theater--London.
Theater Collection.
